column5: A short 10 minutes from DFW, only 20 minutes to either Dallas or Fort Worth. Very easy access to highways and very close to Six Flags over Texas and Cowboys Stadium. Very clean, private room on second floor in a 3 story townhome. This room will share bathroom with another room which may also have a guest during your stay. Includes coffee and cookies.
column8: 10 min to DFW airport, Six Flags, and AT&T Stadium
